channel.title: I don't really get "Hanging out" with allies...
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "I don't really get "Hanging out" with allies..." - Could someone explain it to me?

item.title: Re: I don't really get "Hanging out" with allies...
item.content:encoded: Best Friends and Hanging Out are the same thing.

item.title: Re: I don't really get "Hanging out" with allies...
item.content:encoded: when i know that i as the BEST FRIEND of Right and Anonym ?? tq

item.title: Re: I don't really get "Hanging out" with allies...
item.content:encoded: Oh I seeâ€¦. I sometimes misread things and then get confused about them.

item.title: Re: I don't really get "Hanging out" with allies...
item.content:encoded:
You run missions with allies to get friend points, if you get enough friend points to be on the top friend point list for that ally then you are hanging out with that ally. Then you say "yay".

If you are hanging out with an ally you can learn their Jutsu at 1/2 cost and you can use their jutsu for 1/2 cost.

item.title: I don't really get "Hanging out" with allies...
item.content:encoded: How does it work exactly anyway? It just doesn't seem to make much sense to me.
